sourcesContent: var html=function(t){"use strict";var n="".replace,u=/[&<>'"]/g,r=/&(?:amp|#38|lt|#60|gt|#62|apos|#39|quot|#34);/g,a={"&":"&","<":"<",">":">","'":"'",'"':"""},e={"&":"&","&":"&","<":"<","<":"<",">":">",">":">","'":"'","'":"'",""":'"',""":'"'};function c(t){return a[t]}function o(t){return e[t]}return t.escape=function(t){return n.call(t,u,c)},t.unescape=function(t){return n.call(t,r,o)},t}({});
